conversation.content: Hm, olá, eu eu estou a ligar sobre, uh, estes pagamentos que continuam—espera, deixa-me começar outra vez—eu cancelei alguma coisa?

original_conversation.content: Um, hi, I'm I'm calling about, uh, these payments that keep—wait, let me start over—I cancelled something?

Right right. Subscription. That's—okay so, um, I'm seeing account KEN-4892-PL here, and uh, there's definitely some activity. Let me just. Check the recent. Um. The recent charges.
But I cancelled the the food deliveries last month, or was it—no wait—two months?
So I'm, uh, I'm seeing here that you—hmm, okay this is, um, interesting. The cancellation for, uh, for order SUB-7731-WK went through on October 3rd. But. There's still. Hmm.
October? No that's—that's not right, I called in, um, September about the—oh wait, maybe that was for something else?
Actually there's—let me look at this differently. You have. Three subscriptions? No wait. Sorry, two subscriptions under KEN-4892-PL.

Okay so. Um. One is definitely cancelled—that's SUB-7731-WK, uh, which was the pet food. But. Hmm. The cleaning supplies one, that's, uh, SUB-7739-WK, and it's. Still active?
Wait, really? They're they're separate? I thought it was all one big order thing.
Yeah they're—sorry, I should have, um, caught this earlier. They're separate. The rep who. Uh. Who helped you before only cancelled. The one. Not both.
So the payments that came out last week, those were for—for what exactly?
That's, um, that would be the, uh, cleaning supplies subscription at $127.50, and it's—hmm, let me just—it's set to charge again on, uh, on the 15th.
Oh! Oh okay, so so I can just, um, cancel that one too then? That's that's actually good news!
Absolutely. I can. Do that right now. Just need to. Confirm. You want SUB-7739-WK fully cancelled?
Yes yes yes! Wait, there won't be any more charges after this, right? None at all?
Nope. All done. Your confirmation is CAN-9847-ZM. No more automatic charges. Everything's cancelled now.
This is—wow, I thought this would be so much harder! Thank you thank you!
You're all set. Both subscriptions cancelled. Account KEN-4892-PL is. Completely clear. No more surprises.
